form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF REFUGEE TRAVEL DOCUMENT

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPAR "MEN'T OF JUSTICE Screene NARA 9/21/2023 Immigration and Naturalization Service UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service REC'D T/C SEP OMB 071977 No. 43-R 0517 APPLICATION FOR FEE STAMP ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF REFUGEE TRAVEL DOCUMENT 488-9658 (Article 28, United Nations Convention of July 28, 1951 and Protocol of 1967 relating to Status of Refugees. 8 CFR 223a) I hereby apply for (check one): Issuance Extension of refugee travel document. FAMILY NAME Capital Letters, FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME C/O THIEU , BANH IMPORTANT: If you are an applicant for issuance of a Refugee IN CARE OF Travel Document submit your Alien Registration Card and any reen- (No, and Street Aps. No. try permits previously issued to you with this application. MAILING ADDRESS 636, ALPINE ST. #5, LA, CA90012 If you are an applicant for extension of the document submit with (City) State ZIP Code IN U.S. this application only the document and complete blocks 1. 2. 19. 20 2. ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER and 21: if you are a lawful permanent resident also complete block 18. A 21 - 203 - 763 3. DATE OF BIRTH (Month, Day. Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF NATIONALITY IF ANY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR JANUARY 1, 1915 CHINA VIET NAM Black GREY HEIGHT VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS Country from which I am a refugee 5 FEET 7 INCHES NONE VIET NAM 4. My present immigration status in the U. S. IS (Parolee, lawful permanent resident. conditional entrant, visitor, etc.) Parolee 5. was status At time of my last arrival in the U. S. I accorded the immigration of VIETNAM REFUGEE I last arrived in the U. S. at: on: by: (name of vessel, airline (city and State) (date) or other means of travel) I was LA, CALiFORNIA, inspected. 7-3-75 AIRPLANE was not I was last issued a visa by a U. S. Consul in: on: (date) Type of Visa (city and country) LOS ANGELES CALiFoRiA JUNE 11, 1976 Refugee Travel Document 6. Check One: I believe I am a refugee because I came to the U. undersa refugee law or program, or because I was granted a status or benefit by the U. S. Immigration and Naturalization Service on the pasts of a claim to persecution. I believe I am a refugee for the following reasons: (Furnish specific details and attach supporting evidence). NIN 7. a. Since Decoming a refugee: have have not voluntarily re-availed myself of the protection of the country of my nationality. have have not voluntarily re-acquired the nationality which I lost. have have not acquired a new nationality. have have not voluntarily re-established myself in the country which I left, or outside which I remained, owing to fear of persecution. The cumstances in the country of my nationality (or country of former habitual residence if stateless) which resulted in my becom- ing tefugee have have not ceased to exist. b. I am not in possession of a passport or similar document. If you have such document, give name of country of IS- suance and date of expiration. 8. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership, and the periods and places ofjsuch membership.
